name: ada-mission-control
description: Allows the AI to manipulate the Mission Control Interface (React Frontend). Use this to change views, trigger alerts, or open modals.

tools.name: set_alert_mode
tools.description: Changes the global UI theme to reflect operational status. Use 'RED' for emergencies.

level.description: GREEN: Normal, AMBER: Warning (Weather), RED: Critical (Mayday/Fire).

tools.name: switch_dashboard_tab
tools.description: Navigates the GM Dashboard to a specific module.

tools.name: open_modal
tools.description: Opens a specific overlay/modal for focused tasks.
